meanings.definition: A mixture of decaying organic matter used as fertilizer.
meanings.sent1: My garden thrives with the help of composts.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use composts to enrich the soil.
meanings.sent3: The composts in the garden were so happy to be helping the plants grow.
meanings.sent4: The composts worked like magic, turning the soil into a nutrient-rich paradise.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh composts filled the air, promising a bountiful harvest.

meanings.sent4: She composts diligently, turning food scraps into black gold for her garden.
meanings.sent5: He composts with care, knowing it will benefit his plants in the long run.
